alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chariton, southern Linn and southwestern Macon Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laclede, or near Brookfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Marceline, Bucklin, Laclede, Callao, Linneus, New Cambria, Rothville, Wien, Saint Catherine and Prairie Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central Missouri.
